Articles.Content:
Well, I'm in the process of building a habitable / refueling space station for my RSS/RO/RVE series. I went a bit "non-ro" because I wanted it to be more of a showcase piece than ultra realism. Sadly, due to the physical limitations of KSP, probably flawed design on my part, the inability to attach a part to two parts simultaneously (struts work to an extent), I've had to go back to the drawing board. 

However, I wanted to share the concept because in my very humble opinion, it was sci-fi geek awesome =D
That, my friend, is very cool.
